snippet.title: Moto Racer 15th Anniversary - PC Gameplay (Steam)
snippet.description:
As the title says, this was a game to celebrate the 15th Anniversary of the Moto Racer series, which during its life up to that point saw releases on PC, PlayStation, Game Boy Advance and Nintendo DS. While the mobile version of it does exist on Android and iOS, the PC version is included with the Moto Racer Collection (which comes with Moto Racer, Moto Racer 2 and Moto Racer 3: Gold Edition) on Steam, which came out in 2011.

Moto Racer (C) Anuman Software, Microids
Steam link: https://store.steampowered.com/app/324110/Moto_Racer_Collection/
